title: cn import: parse H2 headings into separate sections by default
description: Currently `cn import` puts the entire file into a single 'body' section. It should parse ## headings into separate named sections by default (the --split flag exists but isn't the default), making imported prompts immediately useful for validation and diffing.

title: cn create: add --help subcommand help
description: Running `cn create --help` just gives '--name is required' instead of showing available flags for the create command. Each subcommand should support --help to show its own flags.

title: cn show: display sections in human-readable output
description: The human-readable output of `cn show` only displays name/version/status metadata. Sections (the actual prompt content) are invisible unless you use --json or render. The show command should display sections in human mode too.

title: cn create: --description flag silently ignored
description: Passing --description to cn create is silently ignored â€” the flag isn't parsed and the Prompt type doesn't have a description field. Either add support or reject the unknown flag.

title: cn: error messages print twice on stderr
description: Error messages print twice, e.g. '--name is required' followed by another '--name is required'. This appears to happen because errorOut prints once, and then process.exit propagates to the top-level catch which prints again.
